title: Arctic outpost
creator_credit: John Feeney, Tom Daly and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Life at the small settlement of Pangnirtung on eastern Baffin Island, where there is as a Royal Canadian Mounted Police post, a Hudson’s Bay Company store, a mission hospital and a government school. The film presents on-the-spot accounts of the work of all of these. This is a shorter version of the film “Pangnirtung”.
